data.name: Knights & Outlaws
data.detailed_description:
Relaxing and casual games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1027810/ZooKeeper/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/759080/City_Eye
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1031120/Bakery_Simulator/


More medieval games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1103820/Siege_of_Irdor/https://store.steampowered.com/app/944250/Castle_Flipper
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1155850/Lost_Viking_Kingdom_of_Women/


About the Game


A young, very optimistic, and idealistic boy dreams of one thing: to become a knight, like his master. And the dream comes true one day, quite unexpectedly, and now he faces a whole new world of honor, valor, humor, and other words ending with -or.
Now he needs to learn tournament fencing, weapon and armor management, and the rules of the touring knights’ world. If that weren’t enough, his knightly duties take him to solve problems for the locals and unravel the mystery of his master’s death.

Key Features:


Challenging combat- semi-realistic FPS fencing combat
Equipment management -buy, choose weapons and armors suited for upcoming events
Fame and fortune - become the most renowned and the richest knight in the kingdom
Humor - experience the absurd stories of feudal life and misconceptions of knightdom

FIGHTING

Face enemies in one-on-one combat. Play fair or play dirty - it is up to you.

TOURNAMENTS

Improve your combat skills, upgrade your equipment and face stronger enemies.

THE KINGDOM

Solve the mystery of your Master’s death and change your Fate.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1122230/Knights__Outlaws/

data.short_description: Defeat the Fate and become a knight, despite your lineage. Face the world's absurdity and other knights (as well as outlaws) in tournaments to prove yourself as the noblest knight in the kingdom.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
